about.title: Why me
about.description: What fascinates me about programming is the ability to create tangible and interactive experiences through language.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.learning-description: 3D visualizations for the web and the fundamentals of backend development.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.organisation-title: How I have organised my work

project-1.name: El Pollo Loco
project-1.about: A side-scrolling game where the character Pepe must defeat crazy chickens.
project-1.organisation: I structured my workflow using class diagrams and a Kanban board.
project-1.learnings: I applied the basics of object-oriented programming in practice.

project-2.name: Join
project-2.about: A web-based project management tool for organizing tasks and team collaboration.
project-2.organisation: The development process was planned with kanban.
project-2.groupWork: This project was created in collaboration within a team.

ongoing-project.name: Ongoing Project
ongoing-project.about: A new project that is currently in development.

imprint.title: Legal Notice
imprint.provider: Information according to ยง 5 DDG
imprint.liabilityContentText: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws. However, we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
imprint.liabilityLinksText: Our website contains links to external websites of third parties over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.
imprint.copyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution or any form of commercialization beyond the scope of copyright law require the prior written consent of the author.
imprint.privacyText: The use of our website is usually possible without providing personal data. If personal data is collected, this is done on a voluntary basis. These data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent.
imprint.creditsText: Legal notice generated by Impressum-Generator.de. Powered by Franziska Hasselbach, Bonn.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.responsibleIntro: The responsible party within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
privacy.rightsIntro: Using the contact details provided, you may exercise the following rights at any time in accordance with the GDPR:

rightsList.item1: Access to your stored data and information on how it is processed (Art. 15 GDPR),
rightsList.item2: Correction of incorrect personal data (Art. 16 GDPR),
rightsList.item3: Deletion of your stored data (Art. 17 GDPR),
rightsList.item4: Restriction of data processing if we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR),
rightsList.item5: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR), and
rightsList.item6: Data portability if you have consented to the processing or have concluded a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR).

privacy.rightsRevoke: If you have given us your consent, you may revoke it at any time with effect for the future.
privacy.rightsComplaint: You may lodge a complaint at any time with a supervisory authority, for example with the supervisory authority of the federal state of your residence or the authority responsible for us.
privacy.rightsAuthorityNote: A list of supervisory authorities (for the non-public sector) with addresses can be found at:
privacy.visitTitle: Collection of general information when visiting our website
privacy.visitPurposeText1: When you access our website, i.e. if you do not register or otherwise transmit information, general information is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address and similar data.
privacy.visitPurposeText2: They are processed in particular for the following purposes:

visitPurposeList.item1: Ensuring a smooth connection to the website
visitPurposeList.item2: Ensuring the smooth use of our website

privacy.visitPurposeText3: We do not use this data to draw conclusions about your person. However, we reserve the right to check the server log files retrospectively if there are concrete indications of unlawful use.
privacy.visitLegalText: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR on the basis of our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website and ensuring system security and abuse detection.
privacy.visitRecipientsText: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
privacy.visitStorageText1: Data is stored in server log files in a form that allows the identification of the data subjects for a maximum of [please provide information], unless a security-relevant event occurs (e.g. a DDoS attack).
privacy.visitStorageText2: In the event of such an incident, server log files are stored until the security-relevant incident has been resolved and fully clarified.
privacy.visitRequiredText: The provision of the above personal data is neither legally nor contractually required. However, without the IP address, the service and functionality of our website cannot be guaranteed.
privacy.visitObjectionText: Please read the information on your right to object pursuant to Art. 21 GDPR below.
privacy.contactPurposeText1: Our website contains a contact form which can be used for electronic contact. If a user makes use of this option, the data entered in the input mask is transmitted to us and stored.
privacy.contactPurposeText2: Contact is also possible via the email addresses provided. In this case, the personal data transmitted with the email will be stored. This includes date and time of sending, email address, IP addresses and information about the servers involved.
privacy.contactPurposeText3: You may also contact us via the provided phone numbers. In doing so, we collect log data containing your phone number and the duration of the call.
privacy.contactPurposeText4: Regardless of the communication channel, we store the content of your request for the purpose of individual communication with you.
privacy.contactLegalText1: Data is processed on the basis of a legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
privacy.contactLegalText2: Our legitimate interest lies in enabling uncomplicated contact.
privacy.contactLegalText3: If you contact us to request an offer, processing is carried out to take pre-contractual measures (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).
privacy.contactRecipientsText: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors.
privacy.contactStorageText1: Data will be deleted at the latest [please provide information] after processing the contact request.
privacy.contactStorageText2: If a contractual relationship arises, statutory retention periods apply, generally 6 or 10 years.
privacy.contactRequiredText: The provision of your personal data is voluntary. However, we can only process your request if you provide the necessary information.
privacy.contactObjectionText: Please read the information on your right to object pursuant to Art. 21 GDPR below.
privacy.objectionInfoTitle: Information on your right to object pursuant to Art. 21 GDPR
privacy.objectionCaseTitle: Right to object on a case-by-case basis
privacy.objectionCaseText1: You have the right to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you on grounds relating to your particular situation if processing is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.
privacy.objectionCaseText2: If you object, we will no longer process your personal data unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds.
privacy.changesText: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy to comply with current legal requirements or to reflect changes to our services.
privacy.questionsText: If you have any questions about data protection, please email the responsible party named above.
privacy.creditsText1: This privacy policy was created with the help of activeMind AG - the expert
